thread.title: Chelsea star hailed by Alan Shearer after Arsenal display: I've never seen this before
thread.title_full: Chelsea star hailed by Alan Shearer after Arsenal display: I've never seen this before

title: Chelsea star hailed by Alan Shearer after Arsenal display: I've never seen this before
text: Chelsea star hailed by Alan Shearer after Arsenal display: I've never seen this before ARSENAL could not handle the energy of Chelsea star N'Golo Kante in their title showdown. PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 04:30, Sun, Feb 5, 2017 That is the verdict of player-turned-pundit Alan Shearer. Chelsea all but ended the Gunners hopes of catching them this season with a convincing 3-1 victory yesterday . Marcos Alonso gave Antonio Conte 's side a first-half lead, before Eden Hazard and ex-Arsenal skipper Cesc Fabregas extended the lead. Olivier Giroud netted a consolation but the damage was done, with both midfields very different in approach. GETTY Alan Shearer hailed N'Golo Kante's work rate in Chelsea's London derby with Arsenal Arsene Wenger had few available options to choose from, resulting in Francis Coquelin playing alongside Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain in the middle against Nemanja Matic and the relentless Kante. The latter has shown his importance to the Chelsea team this term since his Â£30million arrival from Leicester last summer. And on BBC's Match Of the Day , Shearer hailed the midfielder's influence. Chelsea player ratings from emphatic win over Arsenal Sat, February 4, 2017
